Kim inspects the slopes, and is pleased.

Watch out, Pyeongchang. When the Winter Olympics come to the South Korean town in 2018, North Korea is aiming to have its own rival world-class ski slopes.

Over the weekend, North Korea reported that Kim Jong Un paid a visit to the resort and was “greatly satisfied” with progress.
